register.doc: This register can be used to verify proper integrated circuit functionality
register.name: DCST_RESP

register.doc: This register can be used for supplier recognition, as it can be factory written to a known byte value.
register.name: WHO_AM_I

register.doc: This register reports which function caused an interrupt.
register.name: INT_SOURCE1

field.doc: indicates that new acceleration data
field.name: DRDY

field.doc: Wake up
field.name: WUFS

register.doc: This register reports the axis and direction of detected motion
register.name: INT_SOURCE2

register.doc: This register reports the status of the interrupt
register.name: STATUS_REG

field.doc: reports the combined (OR) interrupt information of DRDY and WUFS in the interrupt source register
field.name: INT

field.doc: Latched interrupt source information

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls the main feature set
register.name: CTRL_REG1

field.doc: controls the operating mode of the KXTJ3
field.name: PC

field.doc: determines the performance mode of the KXTJ3
field.name: RES

field.doc: enables the reporting of the availability of new acceleration data as an interrupt
field.name: DRDYE

field.doc: selects the acceleration range of the accelerometer outputs
field.name: GSEL

field.doc: enables the Wake Up (motion detect) function.
field.name: WUFE

register.doc: Read/write control register that provides more feature set control
register.name: CTRL_REG2

field.doc: initiates software reset
field.name: SRST

field.doc: initiates the digital communication self-test function.
field.name: DCST

field.doc: sets the Output Data Rate for the Wake Up function
field.name: OWUF

register.doc: This register controls the settings for the physical interrupt pin
register.name: INT_CTRL_REG1

field.doc: enables/disables the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEN

field.doc: sets the polarity of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEA

field.doc: sets the response of the physical interrupt pin
field.name: IEL

field.doc: selftest polarity
field.name: STPOL

register.doc: This register controls which axis and direction of detected motion can cause an interrupt
register.name: INT_CTRL_REG2

field.doc: Unlatched mode motion interrupt; 0=disabled,1=enabled
field.name: ULMODE

register.doc: Read/write control register that configures the acceleration outputs
register.name: DATA_CTRL_REG

field.doc: sets the output data rate (ODR)
field.name: OSA

field.doc: This register sets the time motion must be present before a wake-up interrupt is set
field.name: WUFC

field.doc: This register sets the non-activity time required before another wake-up interrupt can be set
field.name: NAFC

register.doc: When 0xCA is written to this register, the MEMS self-test function is enabled
register.name: SELF_TEST

field.doc: Self test value
field.name: MEMS_TEST

register.doc: Those registers (12-bits)sets the threshold for wake-up (motion detect) interrupt is set
register.name: WAKEUP_THRESHOLD_H

field.doc: msb part of wakeup threshold
field.name: WUTH_H

field.doc: lsb part of wake up threshold
field.name: WUTH_L

register.doc: This register can be used for supplier recognition, as it can be factory written to a known byte value.
register.name: WHO_AM_I
